description: outstanding staff service ! although the hotel is a little old and the swimming pool was really small. i will choose again this Hotel because they really care about the hosts.
Great location, good service.  Check-in line was long and moved really slowly though, I wonder why ?

My wife and I both got a flu using our stay. We called the guest service desk, they have us the place to see the doctor. Surprisingly all the staff know we were not feeling well since then. From the room cleaning lady, to the Chinese restaurant manager (they cook a pot of ginger tea for us), to the front desk lady (she granted us a late check out until 5pm), were all so nice and personal. 
As a business person, I traveled many many places and stayed many many hotel, but this one really impressed me!
If we didn't got sick, may be I won't discover the excellent training of this hotel staff! Truly deserved the 5-star rating.
View from the window, assistance of the staff, comfortable beds.

Rooms are spacious and clean, atmosphere quite cozy 
Everything deserves a FiveStar Rating no doubt!
Only thing if I were to not give it ðŸ’¯ would be the building itself is kinda outdated comparing to the newly build Rosewood just down the street of cuz with a much higher price tag.. but definitely will stay here again and any Shangri-la hotels in da world
Theyâ€™re worth the money!
Everything here was excellent. The staff was wonderful, the location was great, and the facility was impeccable.

I travel a lot and would have to say that this Hotel ranks up in my top 3 hotels to stay worldwide. excellent service, excellent room and excellent food and refreshments. The location is also very convenient on the kowloon side and it is a short walk to the star Ferry and the Ocean terminal. will definately be staying on my next trip early next year

Wonderful room. Greatest shower in the history of humankind. Terrific view. Very nicely located for sightseeing and transit opportunities. Very friendly and helpful staff. If, no when I go back to HK I will be staying at the Shangri-la in Kowloon.
Amazing service and comfortable, clean accommodations.

Location is great. Quiet and nearby the metro station. Pricey for the season and staff is ok but lacks friendliness. Cleaning of room leaving something to be desired. Room carpets are old and difficult to clean. Rooms smell cigarrete smoke from previous customers. Persisted for entire week.
Great location , good Close to Mtr and wonderful customer service.
pay for the bay view on a high floor, good health club
The service staff were pleasing to work with. Always ready to help.
Near all restaurants shops all nearby near the Kowloon harbour

Beautiful hotel, excellent location right next to TST East. The room was in immaculate condition and service was efficient and delivered with a smile every time. The bar was not good, however, hence only 4 out of 5. We used the Intercontinentalâ€™s lounge bar in the evening a few times instead. Otherwise, absolutely fantastic hotel at a great price.
Superb in every respect. Huge room, great beds/bedding, highly recommended in all respects.

10/10
Would not hesistant to stay here again, friendly staff, good location to shops and restuarants.

The room is very spacious and bright. The location is very convenient,  it is next to Tsim Sha Tsui East MTR station, it is very easy going everywhere. There are many shopping, eating and drinking places around. The hotel provides many quality amenities/toiletries. Our king bed is very comfy.  The seaview room has a very nice harbour view. The doormen, porters and receptionists are very helpful.  We highly recommend this hotel.
The service overall us good except the service in the Tapas Bar is a bit slow. Waited long time and had to signalled to the waiter/waitress to come taking our order.
We upgraded to harbor view room. The room was amazing, big, beautiful, and unforgettable views.  We love the location.
My favorite hotel in HK because of the friendly and accommodating staff and the location due to accessibility to public transportation and the availability of numerous restaurants.
We used to live in HK and would prefer the location of Shangrila due to the accessibility to public transportation and the availability of so many restaurants around the area.
Classic Nice hotel, good location, the staff is friendly

Disappointed by the rather outdated decor and room condition of a Shangri-La establishment. Request for late checkout was met with, â€œweâ€™ll charge you half day ratesâ€. Never happened with Intercontinental or Marriott hotels Iâ€™ve put up at. Location is good though as it is accessible to a lot of eateries and convenient to move around.

Great location, clean, very comfortable bed and great room with good amenities, the Kowloon Shangrii-La is just what the doctor ordered after a long, international flight.  

My room was extremely quiet with shutters and drapes which keep it nice and dark for sleeping in.  

The king sized bed was fantastic, the bathroom had both a bathtub and a great shower with wonderful water pressure and hot water.

The mini bar was nice and well stocked.  I ordered room service and the food was above average.

The hotel is a bit pricey, but sometimes you get what you pay for.  

There could be more premium movie channels (there were none from my experience).
An excellent hotel ! We were very happy and will definitely make this our choice for our next visit to Hong Kong.
This hotel is very close to the ocean and the night view from its window is splendid. It is a very fancy, nice hotel.

By far one of the best hotels weâ€™ve ever stayed in. Excellent service from the staff who constantly ensured we had a wonderful stay. The room was amazing with a fantastic view. The little things like free water in the room and a teapot of chinese tea weâ€™re lovely extra touches.
Would highly recommend as well worth the money!

Have stayed in many different Shangri La Hotels, but this one is most definitely one of the best.  From the moment we arrived Ms Cynthia Law looked after us meticulously until we check out.  All of the staff, facilities, environment and everything else is outstanding.  Highly highly recommend it:-)

Thank you Cynthia for your wonderful service!!!!
Room was very spacious and well appointed. Location good on waterfront.
great location. very nice property.. friendly staff
Very effective arrangement and nice environment,thanks!

Itâ€™s a staycation with my family, also celebrate my mother birthday.  The staff is nice and breakfast is come with variety choice from west to east. Room is clean and comfort, and they do prepare a small surprise with a birthday cake for mother. Super recommend to stay.
During my stay, all of the stuff are very helpful and do their best to accommodate our needs. The room is in exceptional condition. Location is the best you ask for.
